name: Discover Digital (Circus Street)
overview:
Discover Digital - Rediscover Learning

Discover Digital is an exciting new digital marketing training product. It employs cutting-edge digital technology to teach digital media and marketing. Our guiding principle is that embedding learning about new technology requires practical and sustained engagement with the technology itself. What better way to learn digital than by learning digitally?

The biggest challenge for online learning is engaging the learner. Discover Digital does this like no other training product on the market.

Regularly-updated interactive learning content, with many more modules in development. We use a combination of live action presenters, cutting-edge CGI and interactive games to create a consummate learning experience that is every bit as entertaining as it is informative. Our content is held on an open-source LMS (Learning Management System), which our clients can easily use to track the performance of their staff.
